channel.title: MoparScape Client....5 errors
channel.description:
This is what it comes up with when i open the MoparScape client.
Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape
To fix this try the following(in order):
1. Try closing ALL open web-browswer windows, and reloading 2. Try clearing your web-broswers cache from tools->internet potions 3. Try using a different game-world 4. Try rebooting your computer 5. Try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu
...I need help on what to do ive done all of this except numbers 3 & 5...(because i dont know how)....If this has ever come up for you and you fixed it please tell me how!!!...my version of java is: Standard Edition 6

can you please tell me how to delete that?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2007, 01:57:41 PM[/size][hr]omg i got it dude ur the best!!

item.title: MoparScape Client....5 errors
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Delete the C:\WINDOWS.mpr_file_store_32 directory and restart it

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape Client....5 errors
item.dc:creator: @Ruberg Ruberg
item.description:
@Ruberg wrote:

This is what it comes up with when i open the MoparScape client.

Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape

To fix this try the following(in order):

  1. Try closing ALL open web-browswer windows, and reloading
  2. Try clearing your web-broswers cache from tools->internet potions
  3. Try using a different game-world
  4. Try rebooting your computer
  5. Try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu

…I need help on what to do ive done all of this except numbers 3 & 5…(because i dont know how)…If this has ever come up for you and you fixed it please tell me how!!!..my version of java is: Standard Edition 6
